mapper.insert: INSERT INTO op_clm_info (ord_no, ord_goods_no, ord_item_no, ord_seq, proc_seq, ord_clm_tp_cd, ord_prgs_scd, dv_rvt_ccd, ord_amt, ord_cnt, cncl_cnt, rtgs_cnt, dv_grp_no, ord_clm_req_dtime, ord_clm_acpt_dtime, ord_clm_cmt_dtime, clm_rsn_cd, clm_dtl_rsn_tt, sys_reg_dtime, sys_regr_id, sys_mod_dtime, sys_modr_id, clm_no, org_proc_seq ) SELECT ord_no, ord_goods_no, ord_item_no, ord_seq, proc_seq + 1, #{ordClmTpCd}, ord_prgs_scd, #{dvRvtCcd}, ord_amt, ord_cnt, cncl_cnt, rtgs_cnt, dv_grp_no, ord_clm_req_dtime, ord_clm_acpt_dtime, ord_clm_cmt_dtime, clm_rsn_cd, clm_dtl_rsn_tt, sys_reg_dtime, sys_regr_id, sys_mod_dtime, sys_modr_id, clm_no, org_proc_seq FROM op_clm_info WHERE ord_no = #{ordNo} and ord_goods_no = #{ordGoodsNo} and ord_item_no = #{ordItemNo} and ord_clm_tp_cd = 'O'
